dcterms:creator: Xianda Zhou
William Yang Wang
dcterms:description: MojiTalk dataset consists of 596,959 post and response pairs from Twitter. Each response is labeled by one emoji which indicates the response emotion. There are 64 emoji labels in total with unbalanced distribution.
dcterms:title: MojiTalk

dcterms:creator: Saizheng Zhang

Jason Weston
dcterms:description: PersonaChat consists of conversations that revolve around personas established by four to six persona sentences.
dcterms:title: PersonaChat

dcterms:creator: Hannah Rashkin
Eric Michael Smith
Margaret Li
Y-Lan Boureau
dcterms:description: Empathetic-Dialogues is a dataset focused on conversations where one speaker shares a situation and the other speaker tries to understand the feelings and respond accordingly.
dcterms:title: Empathetic-Dialogues
